metadata.title: CVE-2020-11793 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free issue exists in WebKitGTK before 2.28.1 and WPE WebKitbefore 2.28.1 via crafted web content that allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption andapplication crash).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11793` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.28.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.28.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.28.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.28.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.28.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.28.1-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.28.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.28.1-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
